text: 11:17 Dɨboboniba 20:14-21Egha Israelia uamategha gumazir kaba amangizɨ me ghuava kamaghɨn Idomian atrivimɨn azangsɨsi, ‘E uari, nɨ e ateghtɨ e nɨn nguazim abigh mangɨ vongɨn otivigham, o puvatɨgham?’ Ezɨ atrivim aghua. Ezɨ me gumaziba amangizɨma me ghua Moapian atrivimɨn azai. Ezɨ a uaghan aghua. Kamaghɨn, Israelia Kadesɨn ikia iti.
